name: Gabor Filter Response
description: Analyzes multi-scale, multi-orientation texture patterns using Gabor filters. AI images show more isotropic texture responses lacking directional variation.
algorithm: Multi-orientation Gabor Filter Bank + Anisotropy Analysis
mechanism: Applies Gabor filters at multiple orientations and measures energy distribution. Lower anisotropy indicates AI-generated content.
useCase: Detecting uniform texture patterns in AI-generated images
